contributionDescription:
I have experienced it all in the optimism ecosystem and look forward to experiencing optimism more. Thanks.
Thank you ecosystem for giving me a wonderful experience and bringing me to Optimism, which I really like.
And then I want to say that if the world develops more and more in the future, hopefully the optimism ecosystem will develop more and more good luck Optimism
impactDescription:

recategorizeReason: NO, it is not correctly categorized because the application frequently uses "I" and "me", indicating it is an individual rather than a project.
pwFlaggedReason: This application should be flagged for false statements & deception and promising future impact because it provided vague descriptions about past contributions and made hopeful comments about the future of the optimism ecosystem, without stating any clear, measurable impact or specific contributions tied to the applicant.
